jeus.uddi.client
Class CommonUDDIClient

java.lang.Object
  jeus.uddi.client.CommonUDDIClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
UDDIClient
public class CommonUDDIClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

UDDI v2.0 Spec.을 준수하는 UDDIClient와 UDDI v3.0 Spec.을 준수하는 UDDIClient에 대한 공통 Class.

See Also:

Constructor Detail

CommonUDDIClient

protected CommonUDDIClient()
기본 생성자.

CommonUDDIClient

protected CommonUDDIClient(java.util.Properties config)
Configuration properties를 가지고 UDDIClient 객체를 생성한다.

Parameters:
config - Properties object which contains configuration information for UDDIClient. This properties object overrides settings normally retrived from system properties

Current settings affected by this properties object include:

jeus.uddi.client.inquiryURL
The URL to be used by UDDIClient for inquiry requests. setInquiryURL method overrides.
jeus.uddi.client.publishURL
The URL to be used by UDDIClient for publish requests. setPublishURL method overrides.

CommonUDDIClient

protected CommonUDDIClient(java.net.URL inquiryURL,
                           java.net.URL publishURL)
UDDI Registry의 inquiry URL과 publish URL을 가지고 UDDIClient 객체를 생성한다.

Parameters:
inquiryURL - URL to be used for inquiry requests.
publishURL - URL to be used for publish requests.
